title: Why energizing EV chargers takes so long—and what we’ve learned about fixing it
description: IREC has assessed a set of regulatory solutions designed to improve the process of connecting EVSE to the grid in ways that align with customer needs, writes contributor Catelyn Sweeney.
content: IREC has assessed a set of regulatory solutions designed to improve the process of connecting EVSE to the grid in ways that align with customer needs, writes contributor Catelyn Sweeney.
